name: DetoxAffirmations
0:
”Alexa, open Detox Affirmations”
”Alexa, launch Detox Affirmations”
”Alexa, start Detox Affirmations”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: detox affirmations
des:
*Oct 2019 update: New affirmations added. Thank you for loving Detox Affirmations. Please leave a review to encourage the developers if you love this skill. And share with your friends and family to spread the power of positivity.*
Using affirmations is a proven method of reprogramming your brain and training it to consciously control what you think about. Detox Affirmations help detox body and soul to reduce stress and increase the level of feel-good hormones leading to success and happiness. Add this skill to your routine for a NEW detox affirmation every day.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
